content.question: A population described by a function <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>P</mi></math> at time <math alttext="t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>t</mi></math> decreases at a rate proportional to <math alttext="P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mi>P</mi></math>. Which of the following differential equations could describe the rate of change of the population?

choices.label: <math alttext="the derivative of P with respect to t, equals negative 0.015 P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mpadded><mo>−</mo><mn>0.015</mn><mi>P</mi></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of P with respect to t equals, the negative of the fraction 0.015 over P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mpadded><mo>−</mo><mstyle displaystyle="true"><mfrac><mn>0.015</mn><mi>P</mi></mfrac></mstyle></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of P with respect to t, equals negative 0.02 t" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mpadded><mo>−</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mi>t</mi></mpadded></math>

<math alttext="the derivative of P with respect to t, equals 6 e raised to the negative 0.02 t power" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mrow><mrow><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow><mo>=</mo><mn>6</mn><msup><mrow><mi>e</mi></mrow><mrow><mrow><mo>−</mo><mn>0.02</mn><mi>t</mi></mrow></mrow></msup></mrow></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="the derivative of P with respect to t, equals negative 0.015 P" display="inline" overflow="scroll"><mfrac><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>P</mi></mrow><mrow><mo>ⅆ</mo><mi>t</mi></mrow></mfrac><mo>=</mo><mpadded><mo>−</mo><mn>0.015</mn><mi>P</mi></mpadded></math>

skill.text: Skill 2.C: Identify a re-expression of mathematical information presented in a given representation
